messages.message: Hi, i’m on `aihub-uat.internal`  and the screenshot below pops up autoamtically when creating a new project. Is this intended? It felt like I clicked on something by accident.
this is intentional so that you can adjust the Reader settings if you’d like, before uploading any files into the project

Thanks Serena, it doesn’t feel very welcoming, and visually looks confusing. For example, theres a toggle pill for tables and checkboxes, an accordion hiding the OCR settings. And then a button to delete the project.
I think it would be better to have a welcome screen that talks about why you’d change those settings, providing a bit of context.
